blueprint.label: Multi-Station
blueprint.description:
A station that both receives (left side) & provides (right side).

Put (negative) requests in the left-side combinator.  Be sure the total stacks won't exceed capacity (860 but five more chests at the end before merging makes 1000).

[optional] Put (positive) provide thresholds in the right-side combinator.  Still subject to main LTN config.
